attributes.action: be a little more militant on militant tendencies - intervene to stop the actions of Hezbollah TV communications
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Did you know ? The Times today reports that there are 10 m estimated daily viewers worldwide of the Hezbollah TV channel, "Al - Manar" - the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to strike this out in a peace - keeping mission. Since it's formation in 1982, Hezbollah has killed 299 US and French soldiers in Beiruit and fired 33,000 rockets - surely this telecommunications intervention would be endorsed by NATO ?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
